document.full_text: a u.s. lawmaker with oversight of technology expressed concern that at&t inc's plans to take over t-mobile usa would stifle innovation in the wireless market.
document.title: lawmaker has concerns over mobile megamerger
lines_and_colors: a u.s. lawmaker with oversight of technology expressed concern that at&t inc's plans to take over t-mobile usa would stifle innovation in the wireless market.
